name: Flashlight (itch) (IzzyPizzy)
description:
A top down shooter with flashlight mechanics and map. Explore the map, find secret paths and kill as many enemies in the dark. My first game jam game, hope you enjoy.

Weekly game jam 144

Theme -- In the dark

Controls 

-- WASD to move 

-- MOUSE to move and use flash light

-- LEFT click to Shoot 

-- RIGHT click to turn flashlight on/off
